homeHeader.title: Build, Optimise, & Scale Your Logistics Business with KIZAD, Abu Dhabi's Unmatched Multimodal Connectivity
homeHeader.description: Endless paperwork, multi-layer regulatory approvals, and confusing compliance requirements slowing down your business growth? At One Neuz, we handle the entire process, from facility sourcing to licensing, so you can launch faster and scale smarter. Launch adjacent to one of the world's most innovative deep-seaports to access modern infrastructure, strategic utility corridors, and a lucrative investment portfolio in Khalifa Industrial Zone Abu Dhabi Free Zone.

leftSection_1.description: Drive revenue with KIZAD Free Zone's low-cost, high-connectivity trade, cutting-edge facilities, and competitive tax landscape. Uncover exciting growth opportunities with the region's seamless master-planned infrastructure and investor support.

leftSection_5.title: How We Streamline Business Setup in KIZAD Free Zone

items.title: Pick Your Business Activity
items.description: We'll start with a discovery call to discuss your business needs and goals. Based on this, we'll suggest the best-fit activity and license.

items.title: Choose a Legal Structure
items.description: Next, our experts will help you select the ideal business model, empowering you to qualify for tax exemptions and long-term savings.

items.title: Submit Your Application
items.description: We'll provide you with a checklist of the necessary documents and submit your licensing application to the KIZAD Authority.

items.title: Collect Your Business License
items.description: Next, we'll issue your trade license and registration documents, including the MoA, certificate of incorporation, and lease agreement.

items.title: Secure Your KIZAD Visa
items.description: Lastly, our PRO agents offer customised visa and bank account solutions to help you build your team and simplify financing.

items.title: ADAFZ - Abu Dhabi Airport Free Zone

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What is Khalifa Industrial Zone Abu Dhabi?
items.answer: KIZAD is a free trade zone located adjacent to the Khalifa Port, offering business owners and solopreneurs Free Zone and Non-Free Zone business structures, world-class business facilities, and access to robust investor networks.

items.question: What documents do I need to launch in KIZAD?
items.answer: Generally, you'll need copies of passports and Emirates IDs, a business activity description, an MoA, and proof of registered office address, depending on your selected legal structure and business activity.

items.question: What legal structures can I choose in KIZAD, Abu Dhabi?
items.answer: You can choose between several business models, including LLCs, a branch of a foreign company, and a branch of a UAE company.

items.question: How long does it take to set up a business in KIZAD Free Zone?
items.answer: Business setup in KIZAD can take 1-14 days, depending on your business activity, license, and model and document readiness.

items.question: Can One Nexuz assist me in opening a KIZAD corporate bank account?
items.answer: Yes, our expert PRO specialists offer end-to-end support for setting up a personal or corporate bank account.
